com.thegame.game.level

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thegame.game.graphics.Layer
      • com.thegame.game.level.Level
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener

    public class Level
extends Layer
    The Class Level. Umfasst alle Objekte eines Levels.
